title.title: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.text: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR
title.html: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR

tagline.title: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO ELEPHANT RIDE TOURS PACKAGES
tagline.text: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO ELEPHANT RIDE TOURS PACKAGES
tagline.html: BALI TREKKING AND ELEPHANT RIDE TOUR PACKAGES IS DOUBLE EXPERIENCE TO ENJOY MOUNT BATUR SUNRISE TREKKING TOUR AND THEN CONTINUE TO DO ELEPHANT RIDE TOURS PACKAGES

description.text: Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour is an Bali Double Activities Tour Packages we designed to make double experience while your holiday by doing Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour and then we continue to riding an Elephant at the parks for 30 minutes. Firstly the amazing Bali driver will pick up in early morning to start the doubke adventure, firstly we will do the mount batur sunrise treeking tour, we will arrive at trekking start point at 04,00 am and start the 2 hours trekking to the top, after arrive at the tio you will amazed with view and scenery of volcano and the sunrise, while enjoy the view, our trekking guide will serve the breakfast consist of bread and egg, after finish enjoy breakfast and see the amazing view we will heading back to finish point and will take around 2 hours to go back. And then we will continue your adventure by allowed you to riding the 30 minutes riding an eleohant through the jungle and passed the local village to see daily activitis of local community village. After riding an elephant you will enjoy the deliciouse lunch buffet Indonesian food. After lunch we will heading back to your hotel with bring a wonderfull memory. This Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour is more amazing with assist by our professional Bali Tour Driver.

title.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Packages
title.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
title.html: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour

image.title: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour | Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour is best hiking adventure to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. Mount Batur is located in Batur village, Kintamani District, Bali, Indonesia. Mount Batur (Gunung Batur) is 1717 m above sea level can be summited by physically fit hikers in around 2 hours. Mount Batur Bali is an active volcano that draws tourists in with both beauty and promise of spectacular trekking tours. We offers climb Mount Batur Bali to enjoy an unforgettable sunrise from the top of an active volcano. Spectacular scenery and the vibration of the sacred earth filling your mind and soul as u served by tasty morning breakfast cooked by the steam of the active volcano.
description.html: Bali Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour is best hiking adventure to see the sunrise from the top of the mountain. title.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Packages

image.title: Bali Elephant Ride Tour | Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Packages | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Bali Elephant Ride Tour is some great adventure to riding an Elephant in Bali islands, This journey will give amazing experience to sit on teak chair on the top of the elphant and see the beautiful panoraman view surrounds the parks. The elphant parks we will visit is the Bakas Elephant Park in Klungkung regency, in here you will riding an elephant or 30 minutes ride and will assist by professional Elephant Tour Guide. You will go along green bushes and side of river. During the Elephant Trip you will also see beautiful green hill and sometimes appearance of monkey's.

price.title: Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Price :
price.content:
Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Price :

  • 1 Person : IDR 2,000,000 (Solo Traveler)
  • 2 Person : IDR 1,500,000/person
  • 3 Person : IDR 1,300,000/person
  • 4 Person : IDR 1,250,000/person
  • 5 Person or More : IDR 1,200,000/person

Note :

  • Get special price for group booking

Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Price Included :

  • Private Car with Clean, Comportable and Good A/C condition
  • Mineral Water
  • Safety and Well Maintenance Equipment's
  • Trekking Equipment : Flashlight
  • Professional Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Guide
  • Lite Breakfast (bread and egg)
  • Lunch Indonesian Food
  • Insurance Coverage

itinerary.title: Bali Trekking and Elephant Ride Tour Itinerary :

content.event: Enjoy Mount Batur Sunrise Trekking Tour
Trekking Finish and Continue the tour
Lunch Finish and Back to hotel

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.
